title: Hot Talent Joins The Cigar Authority!
itunes:title: Hot Talent Joins The Cigar Authority!
description: The Smoking Hot Cigar Chick and The Stogie Guys join Dave Garofalo, Mr Jonathan and Chuck Morrison on today's Cigar Authority. Dave updates us on his return from Washington DC, Mr Jonathan and Chuck go head to head on This Date in History, and we smoke the Macanudo Cru Royale and the El Baton. It's time for the finer things in life... It's time for The Cigar Authority!
